title: Aditya Birla New Age Hospitality adds four restaurant brands including Hakkasan and Yauatcha to its portfolio
description: The four brands are positioned across the customer value pyramid, spanning the mid market to premium segments, the company said. Hakkasan is a Michelin-starred brand serving modern Cantonese food. Yauatcha is an award-winning dim sum teahouse from London.
